Kyle Walker on David Silva: "He's one of the nicest, most humble people I’ve ever met in my life. That's the least he deserves [winning the UCL]

He has won the World Cup, the Euros, the Premier League, FA Cup, Carabao Cup and he is missing the Champions League..."

“We’ve said it already, we owe it to David. Vinnie even said it when he left, he wants us to win the UCL. 'Go and win it for me', he said, but especially for David as well. Hopefully we can do that..."

“We missed the Premier League, which would have been a nice send off for him, but hopefully we can repay him with the UCL.” ğŸ’™

City fully intend to sign Kalidou Koulibaly this summer and will raise their €65m offer to get closer to Napoli’s €80m asking price. Negotiations are continuing behind the scenes.
